content: except in the case of brief quotations embodied in critical reviews and certain other noncommercial uses permitted by copyright law this pattern is for personal use only it may not be used for commercial purposes without the express permission of hanjan crochet ltd finished items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities with credit given to hanjan crochet ltd for the design thank you for respecting the hard work and dedication that went into creating this pattern - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the pattern the designer makes no warranties of any kind either express or implied including but not limited to warranties of merchantability non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose the designer is not liable for any damages including but not limited to direct indirect incidental or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the pattern - updates and maintenance includes free updates for any corrections or clarifications updates will be sent via email or can be downloaded from your account - legal and contact information business name hanjan crochet ltd business address 61 bridge street kington hr5 3dj privacy policy https //www hanjancrochet com/privacy-policy/ eu compliance responsible person for authorities only eucomply oü parnu mnt 139b-14 11317 tallinn estonia hello at eucompliancepartner com
